title: 【求助】服务器开不起来（Multicraft）
author: zhouxiangnan
txt_content:
03.05 15:20:16 [Multicraft] Server stopped
03.05 15:20:16 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
03.05 15:20:16 [Multicraft] Server shut down
03.05 15:20:12 [Multicraft] Stopping server!
03.05 15:20:12 [Multicraft] Received stop command
03.05 15:20:03 [Server] INFO 2015-05-03 15:20:03,868 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
03.05 15:20:03 [Server] INFO A problem occurred running the Server launcher.2015-05-03 15:20:03,826 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
03.05 15:19:58 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "MCPC+1.7.10(有插件有MOD)"
03.05 15:19:58 [Multicraft] Starting server!
03.05 15:19:58 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
03.05 15:19:58 [Multicraft] Server stopped
03.05 15:19:58 [Multicraft] Retrying server startup
03.05 15:19:53 [Multicraft] Server stopped
03.05 15:19:53 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
03.05 15:19:53 [Multicraft] Server shut down
03.05 15:19:39 [Server] INFO 2015-05-03 15:19:39,526 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
03.05 15:19:39 [Server] INFO A problem occurred running the Server launcher.2015-05-03 15:19:39,522 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
就这些。。。
我把在我的电脑上运行良好的服务端传上去，就出现这样的情况

replies.author: 章袁
replies.txt_content: 这是正常的现象，显示正在开服，我开过服，但是都成功了，你开服后能进服务器吗

replies.author: zhouxiangnan
replies.txt_content:
章袁 发表于 2015-5-3 15:50
这是正常的现象，显示正在开服，我开过服，但是都成功了，你开服后能进服务器吗 ...
事实上我想问如何更改Multicraft的启动bat文件
或者如何更改核心jar版本
